name: Beyond the Atmosphere
description:
The game:

You play as an astronout trying to get to the atmosphere from earth.

Try and go as high as possible on each level (there are 3)

Keys:

-left & right arrows / a & d to move around

-up arrow / w to fly with your jetpack (fling with depleate you fuel bar, watch out!)

-x to hit (pro tip: you can collect a knight sword)

Good luck, and have fun!

Note: due to IRL reasons the game isnt fully done, spikes sometimes crush the game, kinda rare but it happnes. hopefully wont happen to you :(
